CloudTrucks- Senior Front-End Engineer - SF - On-site - Full-time - $185k-$225k + Equity - https://jobs.ashbyhq.com/cloudtrucks/acddc0ac-c67f-4f40-9b6c…

CloudTrucks is building tools to help truck driver's manage their business and earn more money.The U.S. trucking industry generates over $700 billion annually, with more than 3.5 million truck drivers on the road. As a company we’ve hit ambitious growth targets in 2024 and are gearing up to accelerate that momentum even more next year. As a Senior Engineer on the Growth Engineering Team, you’ll play a key role in supporting this next phase of growth by rethinking how we onboard drivers at scale and enabling them to get on the road quickly.

You can email: george [at] cloudtrucks [dot] com to learn more and apply
